name: Party Bus Forever!
description:
Keep the PARTY alive! Party Bus needs your help! You’ve taken charge over the city’s traffic system, so use it to help Party Bus reach his excited guests and keep the suits out of his toned tail.

Use the mouse or WASD to change traffic modes, then press on the intersections to change their direction! Hold SPACE or click on the fast forward button when the party is going too slow!

Have fun!!

Topper - Design and coder

Maakole - Art

Whelp - Audio
